thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com
thread.title: Guinea55

author: Guinea55
title: Guinea55
text: I recently purchased a Office 365 plan with them as I wanted to change my email provider for my custom domain. The setup worked good and all, but later I found a cheaper option. But, was unable to contact go daddy support until this morning because there chat is always offline and I will not call. Once I finally got a support agent (After 20+ minutes) I told them that I want to request a refund and they verified my account and then told me that I COULDENT get a refund because it was over 48 hours... I have now cancelled my service, and my PayPal payments and moved my email back to my original provider. Very disappointed and will not do business here again. (Just a note, the office 365 services here cost $10 PER MONTH while Microsoft WHO MADE office 365 is selling services for only $4 per month...)
